title: History of Public Parks
synopsis: Here we look at researching and gathering information about public parks, that is parks that were brought into existence by local councils.

title: Welcome Visitors
synopsis: Here we write and research about the [[History of Pubic Parks]]. Our aim here is to work together to create an a shared resource, a digital commons about [[Public Park]]s, [[Allotment]]s, and [[Community Garden]]s..
